segments.text: Ugh, what a gross mess in there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's gushing out of the sink all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's turning into a slippery puddle of filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, unaware and soaking her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked up, probably dirty too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing for cookies in this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting, covered in water I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the jar, who knows if it's clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's reaching up, eager for the sticky treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole counter area's going to be ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside looks tidy, but this kitchen is revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness with hygiene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the water before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
